Articles.Content:
I need a spaceship that can easily land on Jool moons, even the hardest one to land, with a plenty of fuel for midcourse corrections and landing. Doesn't matter if modded or stock parts, just place spacecraft file and tell me what mods you use.

It seems that all ships i design can reach Jool moons but can't land on them, especially on Laythe.

Full stock, very easy to fly.

You have five full fuel tanks on a nuclear engine, so it has plenty of fuel.
